meanings.definition: An excessive or abnormal propensity for lying or exaggerating.
meanings.sent1: Her mythomania made it hard to trust her words.
meanings.sent2: His mythomania led to many fabricated stories.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's mythomania made his jokes unbelievable.
meanings.sent4: Her mythomania created a web of deceit around her.
meanings.sent5: The mythomania of the character made the plot twist unexpected.

meanings.definition: A mental disorder characterized by the compulsion to invent or tell lies.
meanings.sent1: The psychologist diagnosed him with mythomania.
meanings.sent2: Her mythomania caused chaos in her relationships.
meanings.sent3: The detective found the suspect's mythomania amusing.
meanings.sent4: His mythomania painted a false picture of his life.
meanings.sent5: The mythomania of the patient made treatment challenging.
